welcome.title: Welcome to Qassama!
welcome.description: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started with managing your shared expenses.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.description: Tap here to view and edit your profile information.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay updated with expense notifications and group activities.

balance.title: Balance Overview
balance.description: See how much you owe and how much others owe you at a glance.

overview.title: Monthly Overview
overview.description: Track your monthly expenses with visual charts and summaries.

recent_activity.title: Recent Activity
recent_activity.description: View your latest transactions and expense activities.

see_all.title: See All Expenses
see_all.description: Tap here to view all your expenses in detail.

bottom_navigation.title: Navigation
bottom_navigation.description: Use the bottom tabs to navigate between Home, New Expense, Groups, and Profile.
